english.segment1: Giver of every breath I breathe, author of all eternity. Giver of every perfect thing, to you be the glory
english.segment2: Maker of heaven and of earth, no one can comprehend your worth. King over all the universe, to you be the glory
english.segment3: And I am alive because I'm alive in you
english.segment4: And it's all because of Jesus I'm alive. It's all because the blood of Jesus Christ. That covers me and raised this dead man's life. It's all because of Jesus I'm alive. I'm alive, I'm alive
english.segment5: Giver of every breath I breathe, author of all eternity. Giver of every perfect thing, to you be the glory
english.segment6: Maker of heaven and of earth, no one can comprehend worth. King over all the universe, to you be the glory
english.segment7: And I am alive because I'm alive in you
english.segment8: And it's all because of Jesus I'm alive. And it's all because of the blood of Jesus Christ. That covers me and raised this dead man's life. It's all because of Jesus
english.segment9: Every sunrise sings your praise. The universe cries out your praise. I'm singing freedom all my days. Now that I'm alive
english.segment10: And it's all because of Jesus I'm alive. It's all because of the blood of Jesus Christ. That covers me and raised this dead man's life. It's all because of Jesus. (x2)
english.segment11: I'm alive, I'm alive, I'm alive
